idea:
Flo is a direct to consumer mattress brand built around a deep understanding of Indian sleep habits & preferences. 

We're cutting through the clutter with one perfect mattress that:

1. is more comfortable than anything you've ever slept on thanks to our proprietary Responsive foam technology

2. costs 50% less than an equivalent product sold via traditional brick & mortar retailers

3. comes with a 100 night trial policy so you have the option of returning it within 3 months of use for a full refund if it fails to deliver on our promise of superior comfort

4. comes with an industry leading 10 year warranty (because we're confident of the raw materials we're using)

5. gets vacuum & roll packed before it is shipped to you in a box; just cut open the plastic and watch the magic unfold!
name: FLO SLEEP SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The Economiser Website

We are trying to solve the need for financial knowledge and time required to save and invest. We want to make the process of saving and investments completely automatic without our customers even thinking for a second on where and how to invest to make the maximum savings. We want to do all of this without our customers actually feeling that they don't have money for their daily needs.
